SqlQuery.Data: SELECT event.*, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ver, 0) as ip_ver, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_hlen, 0) as ip_hlen, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_tos, 0) as ip_tos, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_len, 0) as ip_len, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_id, 0) as ip_id, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_flags, 0) as ip_flags, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_off, 0) as ip_off, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ttl, 0) as ip_ttl, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_proto, 0) as ip_proto, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_csum, 0) as ip_csum, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_sport, 0) as tcp_sport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_sport, 0) as udp_sport, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_dport, 0) as tcp_dport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_dport, 0) as udp_dport, signature.sig_sid as sig_sid, signature.sig_name as sig_name, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, IFNULL(signature.sig_rev, 0) as sig_rev, IFNULL(signature.sig_gid, 0) as sig_gid, IFNULL(sig_class.sig_class_name,'') as sig_class_name, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_seq, 0) as tcp_seq, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_ack, 0) as tcp_ack, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_off, 0) as tcp_off, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_res, 0) as tcp_res, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_flags, 0) as tcp_flags, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_win, 0) as tcp_win, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_csum, 0) as tcp_csum, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_urp, 0) as tcp_urp, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_len, 0) as udp_len, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_csum, 0) as udp_csum, data.data_payload as data_payload FROM (SELECT event.timestamp as timestamp, event.sid as sid, event.cid as cid, event.signature FROM event ORDER BY event.timestamp desc LIMIT @0,@1) as event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN sig_class on (signature.sig_class_id = sig_class.sig_class_id) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.sid IN (SELECT sid FROM sensor WHERE hostname=@1) GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_priority DESC, signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_priority DESC, signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 AND event.sid IN (SELECT sid FROM sensor WHERE hostname=@2) GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_priority DESC, signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_priority DESC, signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND signature.sig_priority = @1 AND event.sid IN (SELECT sid FROM sensor WHERE hostname=@2) GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND signature.sig_priority = @1 GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 AND signature.sig_priority = @2 AND event.sid IN (SELECT sid FROM sensor WHERE hostname=@3) GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_name;

SELECT signature.sig_id, signature.sig_name, signature.sig_sid, signature.sig_gid, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, count(signature.sig_name) AS count FROM signature JOIN event ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) JOIN iphdr ON (iphdr.cid = event.cid AND iphdr.sid = event.sid) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 AND signature.sig_priority = @2 GROUP BY signature.sig_id ORDER BY signature.sig_name;

SELECT IFNULL(event.cid, 0) as cid, IFNULL(event.sid, 0) as sid, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ver, 0) as ip_ver, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_hlen, 0) as ip_hlen, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_tos, 0) as ip_tos, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_len, 0) as ip_len, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_id, 0) as ip_id, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_flags, 0) as ip_flags, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_off, 0) as ip_off, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ttl, 0) as ip_ttl, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_proto, 0) as ip_proto, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_csum, 0) as ip_csum, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_sport, 0) as tcp_sport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_sport, 0) as udp_sport, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_dport, 0) as tcp_dport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_dport, 0) as udp_dport, event.timestamp as timestamp, signature.sig_id as sig_id, signature.sig_sid as sig_sid, signature.sig_name as sig_name, IFNULL(signature.sig_priority, 0) as sig_priority, IFNULL(signature.sig_rev, 0) as sig_rev, IFNULL(signature.sig_gid, 0) as sig_gid, IFNULL(sig_class.sig_class_name,'') as sig_class_name, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_seq, 0) as tcp_seq, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_ack, 0) as tcp_ack, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_off, 0) as tcp_off, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_res, 0) as tcp_res, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_flags, 0) as tcp_flags, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_win, 0) as tcp_win, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_csum, 0) as tcp_csum, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_urp, 0) as tcp_urp, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_len, 0) as udp_len, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_csum, 0) as udp_csum, data.data_payload as data_payload, IFNULL(acknowledgment.id, 0) as acknowledgment_id, IFNULL(acknowledgment.initials, '') as initials, IFNULL(acknowledgment_class.desc, '') as acknowledgment_class FROM event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment on (acknowledgment.sid = event.sid AND acknowledgment.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment_class on (acknowledgment_class.id = acknowledgment.class ) LEFT JOIN sig_class on (signature.sig_class_id = sig_class.sig_class_id) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND signature.sig_id = @1 LIMIT @2, @3

iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 AND signature.sig_id = @2 LIMIT @3, @4

SELECT event.*, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_ver, 0) as ip_ver, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_hlen, 0) as ip_hlen, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_tos, 0) as ip_tos, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_len, 0) as ip_len, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_id, 0) as ip_id, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_flags, 0) as ip_flags, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_off, 0) as ip_off, data.data_payload as data_payload FROM (SELECT event.timestamp as timestamp, event.sid as sid, event.cid as cid, event.signature FROM event ORDER BY event.timestamp desc) as event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN sig_class on (signature.sig_class_id = sig_class.sig_class_id) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE exclude.id IS NULL AND

SELECT reference.ref_tag as ref_tag, reference_system.ref_system_name as ref_system_name FROM reference LEFT JOIN sig_reference on reference.ref_id = sig_reference.ref_id LEFT JOIN signature on sig_reference.sig_id = signature.sig_id LEFT JOIN reference_system on reference.ref_system_id = reference_system.ref_system_id WHERE signature.sig_id = @0 ORDER BY sig_reference.ref_seq
SELECT DISTINCT sig_name, sig_sid FROM signature ORDER BY sig_name
SELECT distinct sig_priority FROM signature ORDER BY sig_priority DESC
SELECT sig_class_id, sig_class_name FROM sig_class ORDER BY sig_class_name

SELECT sensor.sid as sid, sensor.hostname as hostname, sensor.interface AS inter, (SELECT event.timestamp FROM event WHERE event.sid = sensor.sid ORDER BY sid DESC LIMIT 1) as timestamp, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM event WHERE event.sid = sensor.sid) as eventcount FROM sensor GROUP BY sensor.sid;
SELECT sensor.sid as sid, sensor.hostname as hostname FROM sensor group by hostname

SELECT distinct IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src FROM event LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) WHERE event.signature=@0 AND event.timestamp > @1

SELECT distinct IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src FROM event LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) WHERE event.signature=@0 AND event.timestamp > @1 AND event.timestamp < @2

SELECT distinct IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst FROM event LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) WHERE event.signature=@0 AND event.timestamp > @1

SELECT distinct IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst FROM event LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) WHERE event.signature=@0 AND event.timestamp > @1 AND event.timestamp < @2

SELECT IFNULL(event.cid, 0) as cid, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_proto, 0) as ip_proto, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_sport, 0) as tcp_sport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_sport, 0) as udp_sport, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_dport, 0) as tcp_dport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_dport, 0) as udp_dport, event.timestamp as timestamp, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_flags, 0) as tcp_flags, data.data_payload as data_payload FROM event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE event.timestamp > @0 AND signature.sig_id = @1

SELECT IFNULL(event.cid, 0) as cid, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_sport, 0) as tcp_sport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_sport, 0) as udp_sport, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_dport, 0) as tcp_dport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_dport, 0) as udp_dport, event.timestamp as timestamp, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_flags, 0) as tcp_flags, data.data_payload as data_payload FROM event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ((exclude.ip_src IS NULL OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.ip_dst IS NULL OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.sig_id IS NULL OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature)) WHERE event.timestamp > @0 AND event.timestamp < @1 AND signature.sig_id = @2

SELECT exclude.id as id, IFNULL(exclude.sig_id,0) as sig_id, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(exclude.fp,0) as fp, IFNULL(comment,'') as comment, IFNULL(signature.sig_name,'') as sig_name, IFNULL(signature.sig_sid, 0) as sig_sid, exclude.timeadded as timestamp FROM exclude LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = exclude.sig_id)

SELECT exclude.id as id, IFNULL(exclude.sig_id,0) as sig_id, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(exclude.fp,0) as fp, IFNULL(comment,'') as comment, IFNULL(signature.sig_name,'') as sig_name, IFNULL(signature.sig_sid, 0) as sig_sid, exclude.timeadded as timestamp FROM exclude LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = exclude.sig_id) WHERE exclude.id = @0
